question: our former boss has contacted you to offer you a position to help him start his new company.Write a letter to your former boss. In your letter:•    Thank him for the job offering•    Decline his job offer and explain why.•    Show your appreciation and wish him well on his new project.Write at least 150 words.You do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear …………….,
text: I hope you are doing well. I am writing to inform you that I am not accepting your proposal  to do a job in  your company.
I was happy that you offered me a job in your company.I was very exicted when I got your email that you are hiring for your new startup project.

I would like to tell you that I wanted to work with you because you were the only person who always believe in me. However, nowadays I am working in the Google company and I have a legal agreement with this company. Thus, I have to decline your offer because if  I will start work with you then they will take  legal action against me.

Lastly, I would like to thank you again as you gave me a chance to work with you again. I am sending you best wishes for your new project. If you need any  assistance regarding  computer networking please email me anytime.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
